com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.datatypes

Class UpdateDatatype.Builder<T extends UpdateDatatype.Builder<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.datatypes.UpdateDatatype.Builder<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UpdateCounter.Builder, UpdateMap.Builder, UpdateSet.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    UpdateDatatype<T extends RiakDatatype,S,U>

    public abstract static class UpdateDatatype.Builder<T extends UpdateDatatype.Builder<T>>
extends Object
    Base abstract builder for all datatype update builders.

    • Method Detail

      • withContext

        public T withContext(Context context)
        Include the context from a previous fetch.

        When updating a previously fetched set or map you generally want to include the context returned from that query with the update.

        Parameters:
        context - the Context from a previous fetch.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withOption

        public <U> T withOption(UpdateDatatype.Option<U> option,
                        U value)
        Add an optional setting for this command. This will be passed along with the request to Riak to tell it how to behave when servicing the request.
        Parameters:
        option - the option
        value - the value for the option
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.
        See Also:
        UpdateDatatype.Option

      • withTimeout

        public T withTimeout(int timeout)
        Set the Riak-side timeout value.

        By default, riak has a 60s timeout for operations. Setting this value will override that default for this operation.

        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds to be sent to riak.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

      • withReturnDatatype

        public T withReturnDatatype(boolean returnDatatype)
        Return the updated datatype.

        By default the datatype update commands are "fire and forget" in that the modified datatype in Riak is not returned. Setting this to true returns the modified datatype in the response.

        Parameters:
        returnDatatype - true to return the modified datatype.
        Returns:
        a reference to this object.

        protected abstract T self()

        protected abstract UpdateDatatype build()
